name: Q1 Goals Section FigJam Extraction
description: Extract the Q1 Goals section from FigJam as React code
instructions:
{"user_prompt": "Extract the complex 'Q1 Goals' section (node-section-q1) from the FigJam board as React code. This section node is positioned at (50,50) with dimensions 800x400 pixels and has a fill color with 30% opacity. The section contains multiple sticky notes and connectors within its bounds. Use get_design_context to generate React component code with embedded SVG showing the section's visual appearance.

Provide your final answer as JSON:
{
  "framework": "react",
  "section_name": "Q1 Goals",
  "position": {"x": 50, "y": 50},
  "dimensions": {"width": 800, "height": 400},
  "code": "<the generated React code>",
  "has_svg": true,
  "opacity_level": "<opacity value if visible in SVG>"
}", "success_criteria": "Generated code is valid React component. Code contains embedded SVG data. Section positioned at (50,50). Section dimensions are 800x400. SVG shows section's visual appearance with opacity."}
